Parameter.name: spring.profiles.active
Parameter.description: application profiles: '+fastinfoset' to enable FastInfoset support, '-fastinfoset' to disable FastInfoset support

Environment.name: org.ow2.authzforce.config.dir
Environment.description: Configuration directory path that may contain ${...} placeholders, to be resolved as system properties: e.g. ${user.dir}. Default values can be supplied using the ':' separator between key and value (see org.springframework.util.SystemPropertyUtils class)

Environment.name: org.ow2.authzforce.data.dir
Environment.description: Data (e.g. data of domains created and managed by the API) directory path that may contain ${...} placeholders, to be resolved as system properties: e.g. ${user.dir}. Default values can be supplied using the ':' separator between key and value (see org.springframework.util.SystemPropertyUtils class)

Environment.name: org.ow2.authzforce.uuid.gen.randomMulticastAddressBased
Environment.description: Use random multicast address-based UUID generation iff true

Environment.name: org.ow2.authzforce.domains.sync.interval
Environment.description: Domains folder-to-memory synchronization interval (seconds); value 0 disables this feature.

Environment.name: org.ow2.authzforce.domains.enablePdpOnly
Environment.description: Enable PDP only, i.e. disable all PAP (or other administration) features iff true

Environment.name: org.ow2.authzforce.domains.enableXacmlJsonProfile
Environment.description: Enable support for JSON Profile of XACML 3.0 on domains' PDP endpoints iff true

Environment.name: org.ow2.authzforce.domains.xacmlJsonSchemaRelativePath
Environment.description: Path to JSON schema file for XACML JSON Profile's Request validation, relative to ${org.ow2.authzforce.config.dir} (if undefined/empty value, the Request.schema.json file from authzforce-ce-xacml-json-model project is used by default)
